title: Petco Sturtevant, WI - Pet Store & Supplies | Petco
description: Visit your local Petco at 3059 S. Oaks Rd. in Sturtevant, WI for all of your animal nutrition, grooming, and health needs.

Welcome to your Petco Pet Store in Sturtevant, WI! Sturtevant Petco Pet Care Center The Sturtevant Petco Pet Care Center is here to serve as the health and wellness partner for pets and pet parents. Our Sturtevant pet stores are staffed with knowledgeable Pet Care Center Associates to help you find appropriate, high-quality solutions for your pet food, supplies and care needs. Our Sturtevant pet store will help you find a new friend—either by sharing information on local and in-store adoption opportunities or helping you pick one of our [birds](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/bird/live-birds), [reptiles](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/pet-reptiles), [fish](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish/live-fish) or [small animals](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/small-animal/live-small-animals) to bring home. Of course, you will also require crates, toys, [bedding](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/dog/dog-beds-and-bedding) and [food bowls](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/dog/dog-feeding-supplies) ready when you and your new buddy arrive back home. Onsite cat or [dog grooming](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/s/dog-grooming) in Sturtevant courtesy of our certified groomers will keep your pet looking their best. Taking care of your pet is easy with a little support from your neighborhood Petco Pet Care Center. You love your dog and want to bring them with you on outings, but that isn't always possible if your dog isn't properly trained. Access dog obedience training in Sturtevant with onsite dog trainers or enroll in some of our [online dog training classes](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/c/online-dog-training-courses) and learn how to use positive reinforcement and promote social skills from the comfort of your house. Find [dog training](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/s/petco-dog-training) that is good for all stages of your pup's life—from puppy to senior. Petco Pet Care Center Associates are aware of how much you care about your pets' health and wellbeing and are ready to help you find the proper care and solutions for them. When your pet suffers an injury or is under the weather, the veterinarians at our onsite Petco Vetco Total Care vet clinic will help get your pet feeling their best . When the weather's right and you go to meet friends and enjoy the fresh air at a nearby park, you'll want to be sure to bring some [toys](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/dog/dog-toys) and a [leash](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/dog/dog-collars-leashes-and-harnesses/dog-leashes). You want to give your dog or cat the best, including a selection of fun and engaging toys to help entertain them all day long. You can even bring your pet shopping to discover what they like best before purchasing. If your companions are of the feathered or scaled sort, we've got you covered. From [bird cages](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/bird/cages-for-birds) to [aquariums](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish/fish-aquariums-kits) and [terrariums](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/reptile-habitats-and-enclosures/reptile-terrariums--1), your pet will have a safe and secure place to make their home. Whether you're looking for [live crickets](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/reptile-food/live-crickets), red wigglers, [fish flakes](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish/fish-food), mealworms, [bird food](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/bird/bird-food-and-treats/bird-food) or more, we have the food your pet desires. Buying the food, care and supplies your pet requires from your Sturtevant pet shop is easy. You can come inside and browse, opt for [Curbside Pickup](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/c/curbside-pickup) or schedule a delivery. Our buy online, pickup in-store option makes it even easier to shop for your pet—do the shopping and purchasing at home and simply stop by the store to grab your purchase at your convenience. Since 1965, Petco has been neighborhood partners in keeping pets healthy and happy. Allow us to be your health and wellness partners for the pets you love so much. Stop by the Sturtevant Petco Pet Care Center at 3059 S. Oaks Rd., near Walgreens and Ross Dress For Less, for your pet care needs. Reptiles can make great pets from the aquatic turtles to the sun-loving snakes. Shop your Sturtevant Petco store to find reptiles for sale to add to your family. Our variety of pet reptiles include [snakes](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/pet-reptiles/snakes), [lizards](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/pet-reptiles/lizards), [invertebrates](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/pet-reptiles/invertebrates). Selection can vary based on location, call to confirm availability. Once you have selected your pet reptile, begin assembling the perfect habitat for their species. Shop the reptile supply aisles for everything your new pet will need including a [terrarium and tank](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/reptile-habitats-and-enclosures), [food](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/reptile-food), [substrate](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/reptile-substrate-bedding), [hideaways](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/decor-hideaways) and more. Visit your Sturtevant Petco store to view our freshwater fish available. Our vast selection of freshwater aquarium fish varies on what species are in store by location, contact your store for species availability. Our freshwater aquarium fish selection includes, but is not limited each Petco Aquatics Department, educated Petco partners are available to answer questions about the fish for sale, care required and [essential supplies](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish). Our [Aquatics Department](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish/live-fish) is equipped to sell [saltwater fish](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish/aquatic-life/live-saltwater-fish) and provide everything you need to care for your pet. Educated Petco partners are available to answer questions regarding the saltwater fish available for sale, care required and [essential saltwater fish supplies](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish/saltwater-fish-supplies). Remember, the saltwater fish for sale varies by store, contact or stop in at your neighborhood Petco store to confirm species availability. Our vast selection of saltwater aquarium fish includes, but is not limited to [Anthias](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish/aquatic-life/live-saltwater-fish/saltwater-fish-anthias), [Butterflyfish](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish/aquatic-life/live-saltwater-fish/saltwater-fish-butterflyfish), [Clownfish](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish/aquatic-life/live-saltwater-fish/saltwater-fish-clownfish), [Lionfish](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish/aquatic-life/live-saltwater-fish), [Pufferfish](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/fish/aquatic-life/live-saltwater-fish/saltwater-fish-pufferfish), [Tangs for your pet reptile](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/reptile-food). Your Sturtevant Petco store carries a variety of menu options to satisfy your pet's hunger with nutrient dense foods. A balanced diet for your reptile can include, but not limited to, [live crickets](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/reptile-food/live-crickets), [mealworms and flies](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/reptile-food/live-worms) to [frozen mice](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/reptile-food/frozen-reptile-food) to [dry reptile food](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/reptile/reptile-food/other-reptile-food). Our selection of reptile food can vary by store, contact your store to confirm availability. [Browse our selection of small pets for sale](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/small-animal/live-small-animals) as the perfect addition to your family. Our small pet options include [ferrets](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/product/ferret-5004316--1), [mice](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/product/mouse-5004811--1), [rats](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/product/rat-5005419--1), [hamsters](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/product/dwarf-hamster), [chinchillas](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/product/chinchillas) and [guinea pigs](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/product/guinea-pig-5004527--1). The small animals we have in store will vary by location, contact your Sturtevant Petco store for availability. Consult your local [veterinarian](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/s/veterinary-services) to make sure you and your family are ready to love and care for the new family member. Once you have decided which small pet to bring home, set up a habitat designed specifically for that species. Petco also carries everything you need to provide the perfect [habitat](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/small-animal/small-animal-cages-habitats) for your new small pet including [cages](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/small-animal/small-animal-cages-habitats), [feeders](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/small-animal/small-animal-feeding-supplies/small-animal-bowls-and-dishes), [tunnels](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/small-animal/small-animal-toys-habitat-accessories/tunnels-tubes), [bedding](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/small-animal/small-animal-bedding-litter/bedding) and more. Refer to our [Care Sheets](https://www.petco.com/content/petco/PetcoStore/en_US/pet-services/resource-center/caresheets.html) on proper care of your new small pet. [Peruse the selection of birds for sale](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/bird/pet-birds) at your Sturtevant Petco. Our pet birds for sale include [cockatiels](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/product/cockatiel), [parakeets](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/product/blue-parakeet), [conures](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/product/green-cheek-conure) and [finches](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/product/zebra-finch). Each Petco location varies on what species are in store, please contact your Sturtevant Petco store for availability. [Learn more about each species of bird](https://www.petco.com/content/petco/PetcoStore/en_US/pet-services/resource-center/caresheets.html) to determine which will make the best addition to your family from our [live bird care sheets](https://www.petco.com/content/petco/PetcoStore/en_US/pet-services/resource-center/caresheets.html). Petco is your local bird store carrying [essential supplies](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/c/bird-checklist) you need to provide your pet birds a [habitat](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/bird/cages-for-birds) that can help keep them happy and healthy. Shop our [bird cages](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/bird/cages-for-birds), [food](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/bird/bird-food-and-treats/bird-food), [toys](https://www.petco.com/shop/en/petcostore/category/bird/bird-food-and-treats/bird-food) and more.
